DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer age 20 79 year old BMI range 18.5 27 kg/m2 Systolic blood pressure > 140 mm Hg , diastolic blood pressure > 95 mm Hg , systolic blood pressure < 90 mm Hg enrollment Body temperature > 37.5 ℃ < 35.5 ℃ enrollment diagnose one follow disease hypertension diabetes mellitus peripheral arterial occlusive disease coronary arterial disease liver cirrhosis chronic kidney disease stroke anemia asthma chronic bronchitis metabolic diseases hematologic disease uncured cancer chronic uncontrolled infection disease may limit daily activity nonnative speaker
